title: Document Film Room NL Search Patterns & Example Prompts
description: Create a reference document listing all supported natural language search patterns in The Film Room, with example prompts and their expected SQL/output. This helps users understand what queries work and guides future pattern development. Include: (1) All 11 current patterns with 2-3 example prompts each, (2) Expected output description for each, (3) Tips for phrasing queries, (4) Known limitations. Location: docs/film_room_search_guide.md

florentino_gate.reason: Low-cost documentation task, directly improves Film Room usability

founder_validation.feedback: NL search patterns documented in TKT-181 NL Search Strategy plan (932 lines). All 12 intent types, 76 view mappings, and example queries covered.
